messages.title: POSITIVE FOR CREATING JOBS
messages.content: We can show ambition, this is a place of great opportunity. We need to continue creating jobs here in the Highlands and to ensure those jobs offer higher wages, greater career opportunities and the choice to be able to stay and live here. That way we will grow even more jobs and businesses.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Continue creating jobs in the Highlands with higher wages, greater career opportunities, allowing residents the choice to stay and live in the area, aiming to grow more jobs and businesses.

issues.economy: Continue creating jobs in the Highlands with higher wages, greater career opportunities, aiming to grow more jobs and businesses.

quotes.text: We can show ambition, this is a place of great opportunity. We need to continue creating jobs here in the Highlands and to ensure those jobs offer higher wages, greater career opportunities and the choice to be able to stay and live here. That way we will grow even more jobs and businesses.
